description: A meaty and chunky lasagne with a creamy finish.
name: Artichoke, Chicken & Kale Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken breasts, chopped as finely as possible
2 medium carrots, peeled and finely diced
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced
100g artichokes, drained and diced (store bought jar)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Heat up a non-stick pan and fry the chopped chicken for 3 minutes while turning. Remove from the pan and set to one side.
Now add all the veg to the pan with the passata and spices and fry everything together for 10 minutes while tossing. Remove from the heat.
Now layer your ingredients with the pasta sheets and sauces in your choice of baking dish.
Bake in the oven for 25 minutes, after 15 minutes, add the grated cheese to the top of the dish and return to the oven.
